dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4463355S] Re: CRIMINAL COMPLAINT
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain) 
Every one of your customers in both India and Pakistan seem to assume
and 
believe that by saying they run a public poetry forum this means and
grants 
them full permission as also endless of their nation to post endless
hundreds 
of thousands of copyright material 
 
As such it is clearly aware you are NOT enforcing the law and NOT making
any 
customer aware that to post copyright material is indeed a criminal
offence. 
 
As such a serious criminal case is now being launched against you
seeking 
investigation and enforcement of the law imposed on your customers. This
is the 
fourth case in less that a month where each of your customers assumes by

claiming they run a public poetry forum they can post copyright
material. 
 
There is NO SUCH THING as a PUBLIC POETRY FORUM we are in contact with
Indian 
and Pakistan Internet authorities and Governments to ensure this matter
is 
addressed 
 
 
 
Quoting admin@malluforum.com: 
 
> Mr C R Slater, 
> 
> We have removed the content you had claimed to have owning your
copyright. 
> You might have given at least 24 hours for us to read you message. We
are 
> from another time zone do you know that. Are you aware of the fact
that in 
> a public discussion forum any body can come and post anything. How can
we 
> know that its a copy righted material or not. You heard about phpbb?
You 
> heard about moderators in phpbb? You know what is an online community?
You 
> think we came to your website and stole your so called great works.
Man 
> that stuff is posted by our fellow member. Like any body else he might

> have got it as an email forward? You know what email forward is? You
know 
> what is email chain? Can you prosecute yahoo mail, gmail and hotmail
for 
> forwarding your content? If you can then go and do that. Other wise
you 
> will go on shouting against poor webmasters like us and ppl will read
your 
> so called great copyrighted contents via email. 
> 
> "The webmaster has deliberately ignored endless requests to remove the

> copyright published material and is clearly an out right criminal
hiding 
> his own identity behind privacyprotect.org" 
> 
> You might have given us proper time for us to read your email and
respond. 
> You think we are sitting 24/7 in front of the website watching any
body 
> sending emails. What you mean by endless email. You just send an email

> when its midnight here when we were sleeping. Then you started saying 
> about criminal activity. Then you started talking with authorities.
How 
> pathetic. What a pity. Is this the way you behave with ppl? Its really

> shame. If every material has to be slated for copyright checking how
can 
> we run a website. Then whats the point of creating phpbb, invision or 
> vbulletin. If you think your copyright has been violated you have to
give 
> us proper time to check the matter and do necessary actions. After all
we 
> are human beings. Things will take time. This is the way its done even
by 
> companies like google, yahoo etc. If there is a copyright violation
send a 
> notice and wait for the action. Instead of going for shutting down
etc. 
> 
> One more thing about the privacy protect. Its a service provided in
the 
> domain control panel by almost all domain registrars now a days. It 
> protects us mainly from spams. Nothing else. They are not criminals
not 
> are we. If you think every body else than you are criminals its your
head 
> ache. 
> 
> We are forwarding a copy of this mail to privacyprotect.org 
> 
> Thanks, 
> MalluForum Management.
